com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.utils

Class DragonTemplate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ninjaguild.dragoneggdrop.utils.DragonTemplate

  • public class DragonTemplate
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a template for a custom dragon to be spawned containined information about its name, as well as the style of its boss bar
    Author:
    Parker Hawke - 2008Choco
